properties.entry: SELECT * FROM category_lang WHERE category_id IN (SELECT id FROM category WHERE lvl=2) AND lang_id='ru' AND l_category IS NOT NULL
SELECT l_name FROM category_lang WHERE category_id IN (SELECT id FROM category WHERE lvl=3 AND parent_id=33) AND lang_id='ru' AND l_category IS NOT NULL
SELECT l_name FROM location_lang WHERE location_id IN (SELECT id FROM location)
